README.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 # Formation Controller
2 This is the Implementation of the formation controller. It is implemented as Angle-Distance controller and as a kartesian tracking controller.
3 An example of its configuration is given within the config directory with the controller.yaml file
4 # Leader and Follower
5 Leader controller are master nodes (see master.h) while the follower robots are controlled by the slave node (see slave.h).
